title: Microsoft | L61 | Hyderabad | Accepted
content:
Education: B.tech from tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior experience: Employed in entertainment industry
Date of the Offer: January 2025
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Software Engineer II - L61
Location: Hyderabad, India
Base: 32.5 LPA (Including EPF)
Relocation: 4.27 Lakhs
Signing Bonus: 7 Lakhs (5 Joining + 2 retention)
Stock bonus: $90K vested over four years (25% each year)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of base salary every year 
Total comp (First year): 32.5 + 4.27 + 5 + 19.7 + 3.25 (Considering 10% as bonus) = 65 Lakhs
Total comp (Second year, considering 0% increment and no refresher): 32.5 + 2 (retention) + 19.7 + 3.25 = 58 Lakhs
Total comp (Third year, considering 0% increment and no refresher): 32.5 + 19.7 + 3.25 = 56 Lakhs  
Total comp (Fifth year, once all stocks are vested, considering 0% increment and no referesher): 32.5 + 3.25 = 36 Lakhs
Benefits: Standard Microsoft India perks like perk+ where we can reimburse till 30K, medical insurance, cab benefits, car lease policy etc.
Other details: Negotiated once, the recruiter did not budge. Was given 2 days to accept the offer. Also, the relocation bonus is 3 + 1.27, we have the option to go with Microsoft services where they book hotel for the new hire for 1 whole month, but I opted for lumpsum, And the 3 lakhs that I receive would be tax free. And to be considered in the current year's performance cycle, we have to join the company by March end.
